Html:
Hello, I was wondering if adding a help button on the right-hand side of the ribbon control, similiar to the Office Ribbon is supported?  Am I missing something obvious?  Thanks

Keith

Hi Keith,

Nope, you're not crazy, we didn't get a chance to add API for this in the CTP, but it will be available in V1.  For now, you can retemplate Ribbon to add a button in the appropriate spot.

Thanks!
Samantha
Are there any examples of retemplating the ribbon?  I am having problems finding some, and I would like to add this help button as well.
I believe the Southridge lab has an example of retemplating Ribbon: http://wpf.codeplex.com/Wiki/View.aspx?title=Southridge%20Lab&referringTitle=Home
